===What is this Codex all about?===
This [[Codex:About|Codex]] is dedicated to providing information about WordPress.  Please feel free to contribute your knowledge.

===How can I ask a new question?===
If you have a question that is not answered in the [[Main Page|Codex]] you may want to visit the [http://www.wordpress.org/support WordPress Support Forum] or the [[IRC|Wordpress IRC Channel]] where experts await your questions.
